home.title:
Kopacze
-
Diggers
home.content:
We're queer, activist living space aimed at hosting workshops, retreats and events around social and environmental struggles.
 We are committed to  living in an ecological way, and are cultivating our own style of  permaculture. For the  past years we have been working on the  garden, making lots of  preserves and generally familiarising ourselves with our surroundings. We have been renovating the  space as well and a number groups have met in Kopacze. in 2018 we have organized a queer-feminist camp.
home.optionsList:
Help us finding funding possibilities
Come over for a visit
Come over to  help out
Donate things (tools, firewood, construction materials)
Organize a workshop, event or retreat
Come over for isolation or to  practice self-care

about.title: About us
about.content: We are a group of  people coming from different areas of  activism, such as: feminism, queer, animal rights, human rights, deep ecology. We are a house collective aiming at creating new patterns of  relationships with each other and others around us. We want our home to  be safer space for ourselves and all those, who want to  come here.
about.aboutSpace:
There's plenty of  space here. We are surrounded by forests, medows and fields, with a little pond just behind our house. the  farm itself consist of  couple of  buildings - an old barn which is going to  become our main workshop space in the  future, three workshop spaces and house with an attic.
At the  moment we have the  capacity to  host groups of  6-8 people and bigger groups in summer (camping and working outside in provided outdoor facilities).

supportUs.title: Support us
supportUs.content:
We're currently in need for hand tools, power tools, all kind of  construction materials and building stuff (wood, clay, firebricks, windows).
Seeds and plants are welcome as well!
We're also looking for means of  financial support, if you have any ideas or skills you would like to  share in this topic, contact us!
We appreciate any kind of  physical help, if you want to  come and help by doing something, drop us a line, we'll tell you, what is currently going on and what kind of  help would be useful.
If you have any knowledge or skills in the  areas of  construction, electrics, renovation, roofing, windowing, etc you would like to  share, we would be very happy to  learn!
